name: Red Scanlon
description:
Drinkovsky Industries and Gamebomb.ru have taken over the eastern hemisphere and are now a major threat to civilized life as we know it. There is only one hope left on the horizon who is man enough to take down communism once and for all. The Red Scanlon!

Credits:

Programming,Sound - Gnomeonfire @Lucas_Lite

Art,Animation,Design - Spakkle @SainezArt

Music - HamsterAlliance @hamst3r

GameBomb.ru Logo - Fobwashed @Fobwashed

Flight Club Logo - @MrB0nd07
